Posts.Content: khertenst wrote: I'm getting my first Taxol treatment next week and I've heard scary things about reactions to the infusions. Anyone out there with experience getting Taxol? Dx 4/12/2011, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 3, 0/1 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Taxol Concerns khertenst Babs37

Posts.Content: Aug 20, 2011 10:18AM khertenst wrote: Thanks for the wonderful info. I have found that the cancer center where I get my chemo gives you a choice of popsicles or ice chips during Adriamycin administration to prevent mouth sores as a matter of course.
